alert.note: Alert for Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 11:21AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern New Hanover, southwestern Pender and northeastern Brunswick Counties through 1145 AM EDT... At 1121 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Phoenix, or near Leland, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... The Borough, Phoenix, Currie, and Montague. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender
